NonDrop.description: Primary Source: None, currently unobtainable in challenge leagues

itemTagDefinitions.//comment2: Drop source or common currency type tags

Breach.description: Drops from Breach Encounters and Rewards

Harbinger.description: Drops from Harbinger encounters and Rewards

Eldritch.description: Drops from Exarch and Eater influenced monsters or bosses

itemTagDefinitions.//comment3: tags for highly specific items to give them some tag and provide isHiddenByDefault

GemOutcome.description: Gives a Gem reward when turned in

CurrencyOutcome.description: Gives a Currency reward when turned in

UniqueOutcome.description: Gives a Unique item reward when turned in

SixLinkOutcome.description: Gives a Six-Link reward when turned in

MapOutcome.description: Gives a Map, Fragment or other similar reward when turned in

InfluencedOutcome.description: Gives an item that is influenced

//comment1: These item bonus info texts are displayed in the FilterBlade Customizer tierList hoverBoxes. The texts are separate for section, baseType and (optional) unique name. The structure is: section (e.g. Uniques, Currency, ...) -> 'items' -> baseType (e.g. Simple Robe) -> property 1: 'text' (string to be displayed for the entire baseType), property 2: 'items' -> uniqueName (e.g. Tabula Rasa) -> 'text' (string to be displayed just for this one specific unique).

Tailoring Orb.text:
Drops from Blueprints
Adds or replaces an enchantment on a body armour. This may reforge the body armour's sockets

Tempering Orb.text:
Drops from Blueprints
Adds or replaces an enchantment on a weapon. This may reforge the weapon's sockets

Veiled Exalted Orb.text:
Drops from Catarina
Removes a random modifier and adds a random Veiled modifier to a rare item

Veiled Chaos Orb.text:
Drops from Safehouse Leaders
Reforges a rare item with new random modifiers including a random Veiled modifier

Sacred Crystallised Lifeforce.text:
Drops from Oshabi
Used at the Horticrafting bench in your hideout for high tier crafting options

Tainted Divine Teardrop.text: Unpredictably raises or lowers the tier of each modifier on a corrupted rare item

Tainted Exalted Orb.text: Unpredictably adds or removes a modifier on a corrupted rare item

Tainted Chaos Orb.text: Unpredictably either reforges a corrupted rare item with new random modifiers or removes all of its modifiers

Tainted Orb of Fusing.text: Unpredictably adds or removes a link to the largest group of linked sockets on a corrupted item

Tainted Mythic Orb.text: Unpredictably either upgrades a corrupted item to unique rarity or destroys it

Tainted Chromatic Orb.text: Unpredictably reforges the colour of sockets on a corrupted item

Tainted Jeweller's Orb.text: Unpredictably adds or removes a socket on a corrupted item

Tainted Armourer's Scrap.text: Randomises the quality of a corrupted armour

Tainted Blacksmith's Whetstone.text: Randomises the quality of a corrupted weapon

Eldritch Chaos Orb.text: If The Searing Exarch is dominant, reroll prefix modifiers. If The Eater of Worlds is dominant, reroll suffix modifiers

Eldritch Orb of Annulment.text: If The Searing Exarch is dominant, remove a prefix modifier. If The Eater of Worlds is dominant, remove a suffix modifier

Eldritch Exalted Orb.text: If The Searing Exarch is dominant, add a prefix modifier. If The Eater of Worlds is dominant, add a suffix modifier

Exceptional Eldritch Ember.text: Adds an Exceptional Searing Exarch implicit modifier to a Body Armour, Boots, Gloves or Helmet replacing any existing implicit modifier

Exceptional Eldritch Ichor.text: Adds an Exceptional Eater of Worlds implicit modifier to a Body Armour, Boots, Gloves or Helmet replacing any existing implicit modifier

Grand Eldritch Ember.text: Adds a Grand Searing Exarch implicit modifier to a Body Armour, Boots, Gloves or Helmet replacing any existing implicit modifier

Grand Eldritch Ichor.text: Adds a Grand Eater of Worlds implicit modifier to a Body Armour, Boots, Gloves or Helmet replacing any existing implicit modifier

Greater Eldritch Ember.text: Adds a Greater Searing Exarch implicit modifier to a Body Armour, Boots, Gloves or Helmet replacing any existing implicit modifier

Greater Eldritch Ichor.text: Adds a Greater Eater of Worlds implicit modifier to a Body Armour, Boots, Gloves or Helmet replacing any existing implicit modifier

Lesser Eldritch Ember.text: Adds a Lesser Searing Exarch implicit modifier to a Body Armour, Boots, Gloves or Helmet replacing any existing implicit modifier

Lesser Eldritch Ichor.text: Adds a Lesser Eater of Worlds implicit modifier to a Body Armour, Boots, Gloves or Helmet replacing any existing implicit modifier

Comprehensive Scouting Report.text:
Drops if you have Planar Tactitian Atlas node
Reroll all of Kirac's Atlas Missions, adding additional mission options

Operative's Scouting Report.text:
Drops if you have Solidarity Atlas node
Reroll all of Kirac's Atlas Missions, granting missions with rewarding implicit modifiers

Otherworldly Scouting Report.text:
Drops if you have Expect the Unexpected Atlas node
Reroll all of Kirac's Atlas Missions, including at least one Breachstone

Blighted Scouting Report.text:
Drops if you have Expect the Unexpected Atlas node
Reroll all of Kirac's Atlas Missions, including at least one Blighted Map

Delirious Scouting Report.text:
Drops if you have Expect the Unexpected Atlas node
Reroll all of Kirac's Atlas Missions, adding layers of Delirium to all non-Unique Maps

Singular Scouting Report.text: Reroll all of Kirac's Atlas Missions, including at least one Unique map

Influenced Scouting Report.text: Reroll all of Kirac's Atlas Missions, including at least one Shaper Guardian, Elder Guardian, or Elderslayer Map

Explorer's Scouting Report.text: Reroll all of Kirac's Atlas Missions, using uncompleted Maps where possible

Vaal Scouting Report.text: Reroll all of Kirac's Atlas Missions, corrupting all non-Unique Maps

Fertile Catalyst.text: Adds quality that enhances Life and Mana modifiers on a ring, amulet or belt

Prismatic Catalyst.text: Adds quality that enhances Resistance modifiers on a ring, amulet or belt

Tempering Catalyst.text: Adds quality that enhances Defence modifiers on a ring, amulet or belt

Accelerating Catalyst.text: Adds quality that enhances Speed modifiers on a ring, amulet or belt

Unstable Catalyst.text: Adds quality that enhances Critical modifiers on a ring, amulet or belt

Intrinsic Catalyst.text: Adds quality that enhances Attribute modifiers on a ring, amulet or belt

Noxious Catalyst.text: Adds quality that enhances Physical and Chaos Damage modifiers on a ring, amulet or belt

Turbulent Catalyst.text: Adds quality that enhances Elemental Damage modifiers on a ring, amulet or belt

Abrasive Catalyst.text: Adds quality that enhances Attack modifiers on a ring, amulet or belt

Imbued Catalyst.text: Adds quality that enhances Caster modifiers on a ring, amulet or belt

Tainted Catalyst.text: Applies a random quality type and amount to a corrupted ring, amulet or belt

Blessing of Chayula.text:
Drops from Chayula
Upgrades a Chayula breachstone to a more powerful version

Blessing of Uul-Netol.text:
Drops from Uul-Netol
Upgrades a Uul-Netol breachstone to a more powerful version

Blessing of Esh.text:
Drops from Esh
Upgrades a Esh breachstone to a more powerful version

Blessing of Tul.text:
Drops from Tul
Upgrades a Tul breachstone to a more powerful version

Blessing of Xoph.text:
Drops from Xoph
Upgrades a Xoph breachstone to a more powerful version

Burial Medallion.text: Brought to Dannig to refresh his vendor inventory

Exotic Coinage.text: Brought to Tujen to refresh his vendor inventory

Astragali.text: Brought to Gwennen to refresh her vendor inventory

Scrap Metal.text: Brought to Rog to refresh his vendor inventory

items.//comment1: some of those can techincally very rarely drop from mob that drops vendor price of the items

Fracturing Orb.text: Fracture a random modifier on a rare item with at least 4 modifiers, locking it in place

Fracturing Shard.text: A stack of 20 shards becomes a Fracturing Orb

Ancient Orb.text: Reforges a unique equipment as another of the same item class

Ancient Shard.text: A stack of 20 shards becomes an Ancient Orb

Harbinger's Orb.text: Reforges a map item as another of a higher tier

Harbinger's Shard.text: A stack of 20 shards becomes a Harbinger's Orb

Horizon Shard.text: A stack of 20 shards becomes an Orb of Horizons

Engineer's Orb.text: Improves the quality of a Strongbox

Engineer's Shard.text: A stack of 20 shards becomes an Engineer's Orb

Mirror Shard.text: A stack of 20 shards becomes a Mirror of Kalandra

Exalted Shard.text: A stack of 20 shards becomes an Exalted Orb

Annulment Shard.text: A stack of 20 shards becomes an Orb of Annulment

Regal Shard.text: A stack of 20 shards becomes a Regal Orb

Chaos Shard.text: A stack of 20 shards becomes a Chaos Orb

Alchemy Shard.text: A stack of 20 shards becomes an Orb of Alchemy

Binding Shard.text: A stack of 20 shards becomes an Orb of Binding

Alteration Shard.text: A stack of 20 shards becomes an Orb of Alteration

Transmutation Shard.text: A stack of 20 shards becomes an Orb of Transmutation

Awakener's Orb.text:
Drops from Sirus
Destroys an item, applying its influence to another of the same item class. The second item is reforged as a rare item with both influence types and new modifiers

Orb of Dominance.text:
Drops from Sirus, Shaper and Elder
Removes one Influenced Modifier from an item with at least two Influenced Modifiers and upgrades another Influenced Modifier

Orb of Remembrance.text:
Drops from the Incarnation of Neglect
Randomises the number of Memory Strands on a normal equiment itemr

Orb of Unravelling.text:
Drops from the Incarnation of Dread
Consumes all Memory Strands on an item to attempt to upgrade the tier of explicit modifiers based on the number of Memoty Strands consumed

Orb of Intention.text:
Drops from the Incarnation of Fear
Modifies a Memory Influenced Map, causing items found to have more Memory Strands, but fewer items drop

Hunter's Exalted Orb.text:
Drops from Al-Hezmin, The Hunter
Adds Hunter influence and a new Hunter modifier to a rare item

Redeemer's Exalted Orb.text:
Drops from Veritania, The Redeemer
Adds Redeemer influence and a new Redeemer modifier to a rare item

Warlord's Exalted Orb.text:
Drops from Drox, The warlord
Adds Warlord influence and a new Warlord modifier to a rare item

Crusader's Exalted Orb.text:
Drops from Baran, The Crusader
Adds Crusader influence and a new Crusader modifier to a rare item

Shaper's Exalted Orb.text:
Drops from The Shaper or Uber Elder
Adds Shaper influence and a new Shaper modifier to a rare item

Elder's Exalted Orb.text:
Drops from The Elder or Uber Elder
Adds Elder influence and a new Elder modifier to a rare item

Orb of Conflict.text:
Drops from Maven or in Maven's Crucible
Unpredictably raise the strength of one Searing Exarch or Eater of Worlds modifier on an item and lower the strength of another

Mirror of Kalandra.text: Creates a mirrored copy of an item

Hinekora's Lock.text: Allows an item to foresee the result of the next Currency item used on it. Modifying the item in any way removes the ability to foresee

Sacred Orb.text: Randomises the numeric values of base defences on an armour

Divine Orb.text: Randomises the numeric values of the random modifiers on an item

Exalted Orb.text: Augments a rare item with a new random modifier

Orb of Annulment.text: Removes a random modifier from an item

Orb of Unmaking.text: Grants an atlas passive skill refund point

Gemcutter's Prism.text: Improves the quality of a gem

Regal Orb.text: Upgrades a magic item to a rare item

Vaal Orb.text: Corrupts an item, modifying it unpredictably

Chaos Orb.text: Reforges a rare item with new random modifiers

Orb of Horizons.text: Reforges a map item as another of the same tier

Orb of Regret.text: Grants a passive skill refund point

Orb of Scouring.text: Removes all modifiers from an item

Blessed Orb.text: Randomises the numeric values of the implicit modifiers of an item

Orb of Fusing.text: Reforges the links between sockets on an item

Cartographer's Chisel.text: Improves the quality of a map

Orb of Alchemy.text: Upgrades a normal item to a rare item

Orb of Binding.text: Upgrades a normal item to a rare item with up to four linked sockets

Jeweller's Orb.text: Reforges the number of sockets on an item

Enkindling Orb.text: Adds an enchantment to a utility flask that will improve it but prevent it from gaining charges during its effect

Instilling Orb.text: Adds an enchantment to a utility flask that will cause it to be used when certain conditions are met

Glassblower's Bauble.text: Improves the quality of a flask

Chromatic Orb.text: Reforges the colour of sockets on an item

Orb of Chance.text: Upgrades a normal item to a random rarity

Orb of Alteration.text: Reforges a magic item with new random modifiers

Orb of Transmutation.text: Upgrades a normal item to a magic item

Orb of Augmentation.text: Augments a magic item with a new random modifier

Blacksmith's Whetstone.text: Improves the quality of a weapon

Armourer's Scrap.text: Improves the quality of an armour

Stacked Deck.text: A stack of unknown divination cards

Facetor's Lens.text: Adds stored experience to a gem, up to its maximum level

Eternal Orb.text: Creates an imprint of an item for later restoration. The imprint can't be applied to Fractured Items

Maven's Chisel of Avarice.text: Improves the quality of a map enhancing Currency found

Maven's Chisel of Divination.text: Improves the quality of a map enhancing Divination Cards found

Maven's Chisel of Procurement.text: Improves the quality of a map enhancing Item Rarity

Maven's Chisel of Proliferation.text: Improves the quality of a map enhancing Pack Size

Maven's Chisel of Scarabs.text: Improves the quality of a map enhancing Scarabs found

Reflecting Mist.text: Unpredictably reflects a rare amulet or ring, breaking it into two mirrored halves with reflected modifiers

Foulborn Orb of Augmentation.text: Augments a Magic item with a new random modifier with higher level modifiers being more likely

Foulborn Regal Orb.text: Upgrades a Magic item to a Rare item with higher level modifiers being more likely

Foulborn Exalted Orb.text: Augments a Rare item with a new random modifier with higher level modifiers being more likely

Augmentation Implant.text: Augments a Magic Graft with a new random modifier

Regal Implant.text: Upgrades a Magic Graft to a Rare Graft

Exalted Implant.text: Augments a Rare Graft with a new random modifier

Unstable Implant.text: Corrupts a Graft, either destroying it entirely or replacing the implicit with a powerful modifier. This does not replace the Skill the Graft will use

Growing Wombgift.text: Can grow into a Graft item on the Genesis Tree

Lavish Wombgift.text: Can grow into a Currency item on the Genesis Tree

Ancient Wombgift.text: Can grow into a Unique item on the Genesis Tree

Provisioning Wombgift.text: Can grow into a Equipment item on the Genesis Tree

Valdo's Puzzle Box.text: Contains a Mysterious Map with a Foil Unique Reward

Ritual Splinter.text: Combine 100 Splinters to create a Ritual Vessel

Ritual Vessel.text: Stores the monsters slain for the first time from a completed Ritual Altar for future use

Crescent Splinter.text: Combine 10 Crescent Splinters to create The Maven's Writ

Primitive Chaotic Resonator.text: Single socket Resonator reforging a rare item using Fossils

Potent Chaotic Resonator.text: Two socket Resonator reforging a rare item using Fossils

Powerful Chaotic Resonator.text: Three socket Resonator reforging a rare item using Fossils

Prime Chaotic Resonator.text: Four socket Resonator reforging a rare item using Fossils

Primitive Alchemical Resonator.text: Single socket Resonator upgrading a normal item to a rare item using Fossils

Potent Alchemical Resonator.text: Two socket Resonator upgrading a normal item to a rare item using Fossils

Powerful Alchemical Resonator.text: Three socket Resonator upgrading a normal item to a rare item using Fossils

Prime Alchemical Resonator.text: Four socket Resonator upgrading a normal item to a rare item using Fossils

Aberrant Fossil.text: More Chaos modifiers, No Lightning modifiers

Aetheric Fossil.text: More Caster modifiers, Fewer Attack modifiers

Bloodstained Fossil.text: Corrupted, Has a Corrupted implicit modifier

Bound Fossil.text: More Minion, Aura or Curse modifiers

Corroded Fossil.text: More Physical Ailment or Chaos Ailment modifiers, No Elemental modifiers

Deft Fossil.text: More Critical modifiers, No Attribute modifiers

Dense Fossil.text: More Defence modifiers, No Life modifiers

Fractured Fossil.text: Creates a split copy. Cannot be used to split Influenced, Enchanted, Fractured, or Synthesised items.

Frigid Fossil.text: More Cold modifiers, No Fire modifiers

Fundamental Fossil.text: More Attribute modifiers, No Critical modifiers

Jagged Fossil.text: More Physical modifiers, No Chaos modifiers

Lucent Fossil.text: More Mana modifiers, No Speed modifiers

Metallic Fossil.text: More Lightning modifiers, No Physical modifiers

Opulent Fossil.text: More Drop modifiers, No Tagless modifiers

Prismatic Fossil.text: More Elemental modifiers, No Physical Ailment or Chaos Ailment modifiers

Pristine Fossil.text: More Life modifiers, No Defence modifiers

Sanctified Fossil.text: Numeric values are lucky, High Level modifiers are more common

Scorched Fossil.text: More Fire modifiers, No Cold modifiers

Serrated Fossil.text: More Attack modifiers, No Caster modifiers

Shuddering Fossil.text: More Speed modifiers, No mana modifiers

Tangled Fossil.text: Makes a random modifier type much more likely and prevents another random modifier type. Effects revealed once resonator is fully socketed.

Abyssal Delirium Orb.text: Modifies a Map item adding layers of Delirium with the Abyss Items reward type

Armoursmith's Delirium Orb.text: Modifies a Map item adding layers of Delirium with the Armour reward type

Blacksmith's Delirium Orb.text: Modifies a Map item adding layers of Delirium with the Weapons reward type

Blighted Delirium Orb.text: Modifies a Map item adding layers of Delirium with the Blight reward type

Cartographer's Delirium Orb.text: Modifies a Map item adding layers of Delirium with the Map Items reward type

Diviner's Delirium Orb.text: Modifies a Map item adding layers of Delirium with the Divination Cards reward type

Foreboding Delirium Orb.text: Modifies a Map item adding layers of Delirium with the Harbinger Items reward type

Fossilised Delirium Orb.text: Modifies a Map item adding layers of Delirium with the Fossils reward type

Fragmented Delirium Orb.text: Modifies a Map item adding layers of Delirium with the Fragments reward type

Jeweller's Delirium Orb.text: Modifies a Map item adding layers of Delirium with the Trinkets reward type

Obscured Delirium Orb.text: Modifies a Map item adding layers of Delirium with the Breach Items reward type

Singular Delirium Orb.text: Modifies a Map item adding layers of Delirium with the Unique Items reward type

Skittering Delirium Orb.text: Modifies a Map item adding layers of Delirium with the Scarabs reward type

Thaumaturge's Delirium Orb.text: Modifies a Map item adding layers of Delirium with the Gems reward type

Timeless Delirium Orb.text: Modifies a Map item adding layers of Delirium with the Legion reward type

Whispering Delirium Orb.text: Modifies a Map item adding layers of Delirium with the Essences reward type

Fine Delirium Orb.text: Modifies a Map item adding layers of Delirium with the Currency Items reward type

Prismatic Oil.text: Can be used to anoint special Passive Skills not on the Passive Skill Tree otherwise.

Tainted Oil.text: Can be combined with other oils to enchant corrupted rings, amulets or blighted maps.

Reflective Oil.text: Can be combined with other oils to enchant mirrored rings, amulets or blighted maps.

Clear Oil.text: Anoints ring/amulet. Modifies blighted maps: 6% increased Pack size, 12% reduced Monster Movement Speed

Sepia Oil.text: Anoints ring/amulet. Modifies blighted maps: 6% increased Pack size, Towers deal 25% more Damage

Amber Oil.text: Anoints ring/amulet. Modifies blighted maps: 6% increased Pack size, 25% reduced Cost of Towers

Verdant Oil.text: Anoints ring/amulet. Modifies blighted maps: 6% increased Pack size, 45% increased Experience gain

Teal Oil.text: Anoints ring/amulet. Modifies blighted maps: 6% increased Pack size, Blight Monsters spawn 30% faster, Encounter duration is 50 seconds shorter

Azure Oil.text: Anoints ring/amulet. Modifies blighted maps: 6% increased Pack size, Varieties of Items contained in 5 Blight Chests are Lucky

Indigo Oil.text: Anoints ring/amulet. Modifies blighted maps: 6% increased Pack size, Up to 3 additional Blight Bosses

Violet Oil.text: Anoints ring/amulet. Modifies blighted maps: 6% increased Pack size, 25% chance for an additional Reward Chest

Crimson Oil.text: Anoints ring/amulet. Modifies blighted maps: 6% increased Pack size, Varieties of Items contained in 12 Blight Chests are Lucky

Black Oil.text: Anoints ring/amulet. Modifies blighted maps: 6% increased Pack size, 7% chance for Blight Chests to contain an additional Reward

Opalescent Oil.text: Anoints ring/amulet. Modifies blighted maps: 6% increased Pack size, Varieties of Items contained in 18 Blight Chests are Lucky

Silver Oil.text: Anoints ring/amulet. Modifies blighted maps:  6% increased Pack size, 80% increased Quantity of Items

Golden Oil.text: Anoints ring/amulet. Modifies blighted maps:  6% increased Pack size, 30% chance for Blight Chests to contain an additional Reward

Fine Incubator.text: Does not drop. Awards a Currency item.

Whispering Incubator.text: Does not drop. Awards an Essence item.

Blighted Incubator.text: Awards a Blight item. Usually blighted maps, oils or scarabs.

Cartographer's Incubator.text: Awards a Map item. Can grant special maps, if ItemLevel is 81 or higher.

Foreboding Incubator.text: Awards Currency Shards or a Harbinger item.

Gemcutter's Incubator.text: Does not drop. Awards a Quality Gem item.

Kalguuran Incubator.text: Awards an Expedition item. Usually expedition reroll currencies or scarabs

Maddening Incubator.text: Awards a Delirium item. Usually simulacrum splinters or delirium orbs

Obscured Incubator.text: Awards a Breach item. Usually splinters or scarabs.

Thaumaturge's Incubator.text: Awards a high level Corrupted Gem or valuable Gem item. Usually a level 21 gem, an exceptional gem, a gem with 23 quality or a leveled/quality vaal gem!

Time-Lost Incubator.text: Does not drop. Awards a League-specific Unique item.

Celestial Armoursmith's Incubator.text: Awards a Shaper or Elder Armour item.

Celestial Blacksmith's Incubator.text: Awards a Shaper or Elder Weapon item.

Celestial Jeweller's Incubator.text: Awards a Shaper or Elder Trinket item (ring, amulet or belt).

Fragmented Incubator.text: Awards a Fragment item. Usually a Sacrifice fragment. Itemlevel 81+ incubators can rarely grant other fragments!

Mysterious Incubator.text: Awards the reward of another random incubator (likely bramblejack!).

Primal Incubator.text: Awards a Talisman item. Can rarely award unique talismans!

Sacred Blossom.text:
Opens the Oshabi, Avatar of the Grove fight
Drops from T4 Harvest monsters
Unlocks a bloodline

An Audience With The King.text:
Opens The King in the Mists fight
Offered as a reward in rituals
Unlocks a bloodline

Syndicate Medallion.text:
Opens the Catarina, Master of Undeath fight(The Mastermind)
Drops from the Safehouse leaders in Safehouses

Gift to the Goddess.text:
Opens The Eternal Labyrinth of Opportunity
Divine Font grants 6 additional uses
Drops at the end of upgraded Trial of Ascendancy

Reward Chests are improved

Breach Scarab of Lordship.text: Breaches in Area each contain a Breachlord

Breach Scarab of Splintering.text:
Breach Monsters in Area drop 50% more Breach Splinters
Clasped Hands in Area drop 50% more Breach Splinters

Breach Scarab of Snares.text:
Breaches in Area have 3 to 5 additional Clasped Hands
Clasped Hands in Area are guarded by a rare Breach Monster

Breach Scarab of Resonant Cascade.text:
Breaches in Areas open and close 10% faster for each Breach already opened
Monsters from Breaches in Areas have increased Difficulty and Reward foreach Breach already opened

Cartography Scarab of Escalation.text: 10% increased Maps found in Area for each Map Modifier affecting Area

Cartography Scarab of the Multitude.text: Area contains 8 to 12 additional packs of Difficult and Rewarding Monsters which drop 300% increased Maps

Cartography Scarab of Corruption.text: Non-Unique Maps found in Area are Corrupted with 8 Modifiers

Bestiary Scarab of the Herd.text: Area contains 5 additional Red Beasts if it contains Einhar

Bestiary Scarab of Duplicating.text: Create a copy of Beasts captured in Area

Influencing Scarab of the Shaper.text: Adds Shaper Influence outcome to Area

Influencing Scarab of the Elder.text: Adds Elder Influence outcome to Area

Influencing Scarab of Hordes.text: Influenced Monster Packs in Area have 40% increased Pack Size

Influencing Scarab of Conversion.text: Tier 14+ Maps found in Area have a chance to drop as Shaper Guardian, Elder Guardian, Conqueror or Unique Synthesised Maps instead

Sulphite Scarab.text:
Area contains Niko
Map owner gains 150% more Sulphite

Sulphite Scarab of Fumes.text:
Sulphite found in Map Area releases Enraging Fumes
Monsters affected by Enraging Fumes have 50% increased Item Quantity
Sulphite in your maps is guarded by Monsters from the Azurite Mine

Divination Scarab of Pilfering.text:
Divination Cards which drop in Area are stolen by a Final Map Boss
That Final Map Boss has increased Toughness and deals increased Damage the more Divination Cards they have stolen
That Final Map Boss duplicates all stolen Divination Cards when defeated

Divination Scarab of Plenty.text: Up to 6 to 10 Packs of Magic Monsters in Area have 1000% increased chance to drop Divination Cards

Divination Scarab of The Cloister.text:
Area contains 8 to 12 additional packs of Doedre's Devoted
Doedre's Devoted have 1% additional chance to drop a Stacked Deck

Torment Scarab.text:
Area is haunted by 3 additional Tormented Spirits
Tormented Spirits in Area have a 25% chance to be set free when Possessed Monsters are slain

Torment Scarab of Peculiarity.text: Tormented Spirits in Area are replaced with unusual variants

Torment Scarab of Possession.text: Rare Monsters in Area have a quarter chance to be Possessed by up to 1 Tormented Spirit

Ambush Scarab of Hidden Compartments.text: 15% Chance for Strongboxes in Area to be openable again

Ambush Scarab of Potency.text: 75% Increased effect of Explicit Modifiers on Strongboxes in Area

Ambush Scarab of Containment.text:
Area contains many additional Strongboxes
Area's inhabitants are lying in ambush

Ambush Scarab of Discernment.text: Strongboxes in Area are more likely to be rarer varieties

Harbinger Scarab of Obelisks.text:
Harbingers in Area spawn Empowered Obelisks
Empowered Obelisks drop Currency Shards when defeated

Harbinger Scarab of Regency.text: Harbingers in Area have a 50% chance to be replaced by a powerful Harbinger Boss

Harbinger Scarab of Warhoards.text: Currency shards dropped by Harbingers in Area are duplicated

Expedition Scarab of Runefinding.text: Expedition Encounters in Area have 100% increased number of Runic Monster Markers

Expedition Scarab of Verisium Powder.text:
Expedition Encounters in Area have 50% increased number of Explosives
80% increased Explosive Radius

Expedition Scarab of Archaeology.text: Remnants in Expedition Encounters in Area have 2 additional Suffixes and Prefixes

Legion Scarab.text: Area contains an additional Legion Encounter

Legion Scarab of Officers.text: Legion Factions in Area have 5 additional Sergeants

Legion Scarab of Command.text: Legion Factions in Area are accompanied by a General

Legion Scarab of Eternal Conflict.text:
Legion Monsters in Area can be broken out of Stasis multiple times
Legion Monsters in Area gain increased Difficulty and Reward for each time they are broken out

Abyss Scarab of Multitudes.text: Abysses in Area spawn 50% increased Monsters

Abyss Scarab of Edifice.text: Abyss pits in Area that do not lead to an Abyssal Depths or spawn an Abyssal Trove will spawn Minor Stygian Spires

Abyss Scarab of Profound Depth.text: Monsters from Abysses in Areas have increased Difficulty and Reward for each prior Pit in that Abyss

Anarchy Scarab of Gigantification.text: Rogue Exiles in Area have a 30% chance to be replaced with a Rogue Giant

Anarchy Scarab of Partnership.text: Rogue Exiles in Area have a 50% chance to appear in pairs

Essence Scarab of Ascent.text: Essences found in Area are a tier higher

Essence Scarab of Stability.text: Using a Remnant of Corruption in Area can only result in upgrading or transforming Essences

Essence Scarab of Calcification.text: Rare monsters that are natural inhabitants of the Area are imprisoned by Essences

Essence Scarab of Adaptation.text:
Imprisoned Monsters released in Areas grant a random Essence Modifier to another Imprisoned Monster in the Area
Imprisoned Monsters in Areas have increased Difficulty and Reward for each Essence Modifier

Domination Scarab of Evolution.text: Area contains an additional Evolving Shrine

Domination Scarab of Terrors.text:
Shrines in Area are guarded by an Atlas Boss
Modifiers to the Final Map Boss also apply to these Atlas Bosses

Ritual Scarab of Selectiveness.text:
Rerolling Favours at Ritual Altars in Area has no cost the first 2 times
Ritual Altars in Area allow rerolling Favours 1 additional time

Ritual Scarab of Wisps.text:
Ritual Altars in Area spawn a Wildwood Wisp
Wildwood Wisps grant 100% increased Tribute Gained to nearby Players

Ritual Scarab of Abundance.text: Rituals in Area offer 100% increased Favours

Harvest Scarab of Doubling.text:
Lifeforce dropped by Harvest Monsters in Area is duplicated
Harvest Monsters in Area have 100% more Life

Harvest Scarab of Cornucopia.text: If Area contains the Sacred Grove, it will contain up to 1 additional Tier 4 seed of each type, if possible

Incursion Scarab of Invasion.text: Area contains 12-16 additional packs of Incursion Monsters

Incursion Scarab of Champions.text:
Incursions in Area have a 35% chance for all Monsters to be at least Magic
Incursions in Area have 15% increased Pack Size

Incursion Scarab of Timelines.text:
Final Architect slain in Area will drop an Itemised Temple
Itemised Temples dropped in Area are generated based on current Temple layout, but with randomised room tiers

Betrayal Scarab of the Allflame.text: 75% Increased number of Monster Packs Substituted by Allflame Embers in Area

Betrayal Scarab of Reinforcements.text: Immortal Syndicate Members in Area have 50% increased chance to be accompanied by reinforcements

Beyond Scarab.text: Slaying enemies close together in Area can attract monsters from Beyond this realm

Beyond Scarab of Haemophilia.text: Beyond Portals in Area have 50% increased Merging Radius

Beyond Scarab of Resurgence.text:
Beyond Bosses in Area are enraged on low life
Beyond Bosses in Area drop 100% increased Tainted Currency
Beyond Portals in Area have 30% increased chance to spawn a Unique Boss

Beyond Scarab of the Invasion.text: Rare and Unique Monsters slain in Area create 8 to 12 additional Beyond Portals

Ultimatum Scarab of Bribing.text:
Ultimatum Monsters grant 150% increased Experience
Ultimatum Encounters grant rewards as though you completed 2 additional Rounds

Ultimatum Scarab of Dueling.text: Ultimatum Encounters in Area will always lead to a Unique Boss if possible

Ultimatum Scarab of Catalysing.text: Ultimatum Encounters in Area will only offer Catalysts as Rewards to the Map Owner

Ultimatum Scarab of Inscription.text: Ultimatum Encounter rewards in Area offering Catalysts will offer Inscribed Ultimatums to the Map Owner instead

Delirium Scarab.text: Area contains a Mirror of Delirium

Delirium Scarab of Mania.text:
Delirium Reward Meters fill 100% faster in Area
Delirium in Area increases 50% faster with distance from the mirror

Delirium Scarab of Paranoia.text: Delirium Encounters in Area generate 2 additional Reward types

Delirium Scarab of Neuroses.text:
Delirium Encounters in Area contain all Unique Delirium Bosses
Can only be used with Tier 11+ Maps

Delirium Scarab of Delusions.text: Maps found in Area have layers of Delirium

Blight Scarab of the Blightheart.text:
Blight Encounters in Area have one Blighted Chest
Blight Encounters in Area spawn many more waves of Enemies
Blighted Chests in Area grow larger and more rewarding the more Blighted Enemies are slain

Blight Scarab of Blooming.text:
Blight Encounters in Area have up to 3 additional Unique Bosses
Unique enemies in Blight Encounters have 100% increased life
Tier 14+ Blighted Maps found in Area drop as Blight-Ravaged Maps instead

Blight Scarab of Invigoration.text: Each Empowering Tower in Areas grants Blighted Monsters in range increased Difficulty and Reward

Scarab of Adversaries.text: Area contains 4 additional Packs with Mirrored Rare Monsters

Scarab of Bisection.text: Allows you to select the Nullify Prefixes or Nullify Suffixes crafting options on the Map Device

Scarab of Divinity.text:
Up to 2 additional Rare Monsters in Area will be Pantheon-Touched
Apparitions spawned by Pantheon-Touched Monsters deal 100% increased damage

Scarab of Stability.text: Portals to Area have a 50% chance to not be consumed on use

Scarab of Wisps.text: Monsters in Area have a chance to be Empowered by 2000 Wildwood Wisps

Horned Scarab of Nemeses.text: Rare Monsters in Area have 2 additional Modifiers

Horned Scarab of Preservation.text: Other Scarabs are not consumed on use

Horned Scarab of Awakening.text: You can select one Imbued crafting option on the Map Device

Horned Scarab of Tradition.text: All Rare and Unique Monsters in Area have dropped items transformed by a Reward Modifier

Horned Scarab of Glittering.text: Players in Area gain increased Item Rarity for each Monster slain recently, up to 400%

Horned Scarab of Pandemonium.text:
Monster packs in Area have a 15% chance to be replaced by a random Atlas Boss
Modifiers to the Final Map Boss also apply to these Atlas Bosses

Titanic Scarab.text: Unique Monsters have 1% increased Toughness, Damage, Rarity and Quantity of items dropped per 1% increased Pack Size of Area

Titanic Scarab of Legend.text: Unique Monsters in Area have 2 additional Monster Modifiers

Titanic Scarab of Treasures.text:
Unique Monsters in Area have an additional Reward
Unique Monsters in Area have 30% increased Toughness

Kalguuran Scarab of Abundance.text: Area contains an additional Ore Deposit

Kalguuran Scarab of Guarded Riches.text: Monsters guarded Ore Deposits in Area are at least Magic

Kalguuran Scarab of Refinement.text: Ore Deposits in Area grant Smelted Bars instead of Marking Ore

Allflame Ember of Flesh.text:
Drops from Safehouse leaders in Safehouses
Pack has single Monster
Monster has greatly increased Life

Allflame Ember of the Ethereal.text:
Drops from Safehouse leaders in Safehouses
Pack Monsters cannot drop Equipment, Flasks or Tinctures

Allflame Ember of the Gilded.text:
Drops from Safehouse leaders in Safehouses
Pack Monster Equipment Drops are converted to Gold

Allflame Ember of the Wildwood.text:
Drops from Safehouse leaders in Safehouses
Pack Leader Empowers Map Bosses with Wildwood Wisps when slain

Allflame Ember of Toads.text:
Drops from Safehouse leaders in Safehouses
Pack Monsters are Harmless Toads

Allflame Ember of Kulemak.text:
Drops from Catarina
Pack monsters revive after Map Boss has been slain

Allflame Ember of Propagation.text:
Drops from Catarina
Pack Monsters that die when Rare spread Modifiers to other Rare Monsters in Area

Allflame Ember of Resplendence.text:
Drops from Catarina
Pack Monsters do not drop items
Pack Monsters grant increased Item Rarity when slain, up to 400%, decaying over time
